function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Lack of political will and funding for scale-up of disease prevention and control tools","Impact":"Inadequate implementation of prevention and control measures, leading to increased disease spread","Mitigation":"Advocacy for increased political will and funding, and promotion of the importance of disease prevention","Technologies":"Advocacy and awareness campaigns","People":"Public health officials, policymakers, funding organizations","Owner":"Public health organizations, advocacy groups"},{"Description":"Challenge in scaling-up, financing, and institutionalizing community empowerment approaches to vector-borne diseases","Impact":"Inefficient control of vector-borne diseases at the community level, leading to ongoing outbreaks","Mitigation":"Investment in community empowerment programs, capacity building, and intersectoral collaboration","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, capacity building tools","People":"Community leaders, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Government agencies, public health organizations"},{"Description":"Need for modification of existing guidelines and plans to incorporate participatory planning and intersectoral collaboration","Impact":"Inadequate integration of community perspectives and expertise in disease control strategies, leading to less effective interventions","Mitigation":"Revision of guidelines, training for community leaders, and fostering intersectoral collaboration","Technologies":"Community engagement platforms, training programs","People":"Community leaders, public health officials, policymakers","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"}]}
